books.author: by Lisa Gardner
books.description: The former F.B.I. profiler Pierce Quincy and his partner, Rainie Conner, foster a girl whose older brother murdered their drunken father. Now, eight years later, he has killed again.
books.name: RIGHT BEHIND YOU

books.author: by W. Bruce Cameron
books.description: A canine narrator undergoes a series of reincarnations.
books.name: A DOG'S PURPOSE

books.author: by Fredrik Backman
books.description: A curmudgeon's gruff exterior masks a generosity of spirit. Originally published in Sweden in 2014.
books.name: A MAN CALLED OVE

books.author: by James Patterson and Candice Fox
books.description: Harriet Blue, a Sydney sex crimes detective, is sent to the outback (the never never) to investigate the disappearance of a mine worker. The first in a new series.
books.name: NEVER NEVER

books.author: by William P. Young
books.description: A man whose daughter was abducted is invited to an isolated shack, apparently by God.
books.name: THE SHACK

books.author: by Eloisa James
books.description: An arrogant inventor will stop at nothing, even kidnapping, to claim a workaholic widow.
books.name: SEVEN MINUTES IN HEAVEN

books.author: by J. S. Scott
books.description: Seeking the release of her kidnapped sister, a young professional reconnects with her former flame's twin brother, now a senator.
books.name: BILLIONAIRE UNKNOWN

books.author: by Jodi Picoult
books.description: Waking in a graveyard, an amnesiac anthropologist pieces together her abusive past with a film star. First published in 1995.
books.name: PICTURE PERFECT

books.author: by J P Delaney
books.description: A sadistic architect builds a modern house that controls its (young, female) inhabitants in this psychological thriller.
books.name: THE GIRL BEFORE

books.author: by Danielle Steel
books.description: Four young women share a Hell’s Kitchen loft.
books.name: THE APARTMENT

books.author: by Paula Hawkins
books.description: A psychological thriller set in the environs of London is full of complications and betrayals.
books.name: THE GIRL ON THE TRAIN

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A whistleblower alerts a Florida investigator to judicial corruption involving the Mob and Indian casinos.
books.name: THE WHISTLER

books.author: by Rupi Kaur
books.description: Poetic approaches to surviving adversity and loss.
books.name: MILK AND HONEY

books.author: by Lynsay Sands
books.description: A runaway heads for the heather with her swarthy escort in tow.
books.name: FALLING FOR THE HIGHLANDER

books.author: by Kat Martin
books.description: A bounty hunter learning the ropes runs afoul of her idol in the business, as they both close in on prized quarry.
books.name: INTO THE FIRESTORM
